job_details.Functieomschrijving: ## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, focusing on the entire ML lifecycle from feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. While it mentions extending support to generative AI and large-scale models, the core focus remains on the development and productionization of model solutions within a platform (Canvas), aligning with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer, particularly the 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)' and 'Modeling' aspects with a strong emphasis on productionizing models and building robust systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'feature engineering' directly relates to preparing data for machine learning models, which is a core component of data engineering in an ML context.
The description explicitly mentions 'model dev experiences', 'develop the model solutions', 'training', and 'modeling techniques', all of which are central to the modeling task.
The phrase 'training' is a fundamental part of the modeling process in machine learning.
The mention of 'generative AI and large scale models' indicates work with advanced modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: generative AI and large scale models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'modeling techniques' directly refers to the core activities within the modeling task.

The description focuses on building and operating a 'dev tool known as Canvas' and standardizing 'model dev experiences', implying software development to create these tools and platforms for ML engineers.
job_tasks.phrase: building and standardizing model dev experiences

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas' indicates the development and maintenance of a software application.
job_tasks.phrase: build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions users can 'iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution', which involves software development practices for creating and refining ML solutions.
The phrase 'ML-Ops' is explicitly mentioned as a critical ML phase supported by the Canvas tool.
The phrase 'serving' in the context of ML phases refers to deploying and making models available for use, which is a key aspect of MLOps.
The phrase 'monitoring' in the context of ML phases refers to observing model performance in production, a crucial MLOps activity.
The phrase 'productionize large scaling models' directly relates to deploying and managing models in a production environment, a core MLOps responsibility.

The phrase 'automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production' describes the operational aspect of ensuring models are scalable and reliable in production, which falls under MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solving business problems' indicates that the ML solutions developed are intended to address specific business needs.
